recipe.title: Cucumber Dill Salad
ingredients: 1 English cucumber, cut into lengthwise slices with a vegetable peeler
instructions: Add vinegar, Dijon mustard, honey, salt, and pepper to a jar with a lid and shake well to mix. Add onion; let pickle for 30 minutes.
Stir together cucumber and dill in a bowl; drain excess water. Toss salad with dressing and onions just before serving.
